item.title: Fundamentals of Distributed Systems (part 1)
item.description: Note: This is part 1 of multi-part series 1. What is a distributed system As the name implies, it’s a system that is distributed in nature. The components of this system works together as one cohesive unit. It is also fault tolerant and horizontally scalable comparatively much more easily when compared to a non-distributed system 2.
